title: LocaGroca (Food)
description: Architected a high-performance SwiftUI application with a focus on reliability and offline-first capabilities. Implemented MVVM architecture to decouple UI from logic, enabling automated unit testing and streamlined CI/CD workflows for rapid feature delivery.
outcome: A polished, responsive iOS experience emphasizing local engagement and fresh aesthetics.

title: Grocery System
description: Designed a fault-tolerant full-stack ecosystem bridging iOS clients with backend services. Optimized API gateways for low-latency synchronization of inventory states and implemented rigorous data validation pipelines to ensure immediate consistency across distributed systems.
outcome: Seamless synchronization between user cart, inventory, and order management.

title: MediPlus (Hospital)
description: Engineered a secure, HIPAA-compliant enterprise platform using C# and .NET. Prioritized system availability and effortless scalability through robust backend architecture, ensuring critical patient data integrity and zero-downtime handling of administrative workflows.
outcome: Improved data accuracy and administrative efficiency in a healthcare context.

title: Voyager Booking
description: Developed a transaction-heavy booking system designed for high concurrency. Optimized database indexing and query performance within the SQL layer to handle peak load traffic, ensuring ACID compliance and fail-safe booking orchestration.
outcome: A reliable, transaction-safe booking system for transport management.

title: LibraCore (Library)
description: Modernized legacy systems into a scalable, component-driven React application. Established a strict type-safe environment using TypeScript to minimize runtime errors and optimized the build pipeline for rapid asset delivery/loading performance.
outcome: A highly interactive, visually striking platform for digital resource management.

title: Futuristic Banking
description: Orchestrated a premium UI performance strategy by integrating 3D dynamic elements with lightweight rendering engines. Focused on maintaining 60fps interaction rates and secure state management to mirror the reliability required in high-stakes financial environments.
outcome: A premium financial simulation platform with high user engagement metrics.

title: Home Services (MVC)
description: Built a custom, lightweight MVC framework to eliminate bloat and maximize server response times. strictly enforced separation of concerns to allow for independent scaling of business logic and data access layers in a production environment.
outcome: Deepened understanding of architectural patterns and separation of concerns.

title: SkillStream Classroom
description: Deployed a real-time collaborative platform handling synchronous user connections. Optimized WebSocket channels for low-latency resource sharing and implemented modular backend services to support horizontal scaling during peak class times.
outcome: Facilitated seamless remote education and resource distribution.

title: Campus Nexus
description: Structured a complex domain model using advanced Object-Oriented principles to ensure long-term maintainability. Focused on creating loosely coupled modules, enabling easy updates and integration testing of administrative workflows.
outcome: Demonstrated strong Object-Oriented Programming principles in a complex domain.

title: Strategy Arena
description: Optimized core game loops for maximum computational efficiency. Implemented strict state management patterns to ensure deterministic behavior in algorithmic opponents, treating the game engine as a mission-critical real-time system.
outcome: Showcased algorithmic thinking and interactive system design.

title: TaskMaster Pro
description: Developed a resilient project management interface focusing on API consumability and efficient DOM manipulation. Integrated automated status tracking and emphasized clean code standards to facilitate easier team collaboration and futher DevOps integration.
outcome: Enhanced team productivity through structured task tracking.

title: Resume / Portfolio
description: Built a configuration-driven portfolio platform separating content from presentation. This 'Infrastructure as Code' approach to frontend development allows for rapid updates and seamless deployment via modern CI/CD git-based workflows.
outcome: An extensible portfolio platform that dynamically showcases project metadata.
